formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let GI be annual gross income, Adj be pre-tax adjustments, Ded be your deduction (standard, itemized, or none), IncSD be the Arizona increased standard deduction (25% of charitable contributions for standard-deduction filers). Arizona’s flat rate is r = 0.025. LaTeX: \( \text{Taxable Income} = \max\big(0,\; GI - Adj - Ded - IncSD \big) \) \( \text{AZ Tax} = \text{Taxable Income} \times r \) \( \text{Effective AZ Tax Rate} = \begin{cases} \frac{\text{AZ Tax}}{GI} & \text{if } GI > 0 \\ 0 & \text{if } GI = 0 \end{cases} \) \( \text{Per‑Paycheck AZ Tax} = \frac{\text{AZ Tax}}{N} \quad \text{where } N \in \{12,24,26,52\} \)
